703015f-a.title: Brooklyn: Atlantic Avenue - Clinton Street
703015f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Clinton Street, Brooklyn, NY

703674f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Atlantic Avenue
703674f-a.text:
Clinton Street, west side, at and north of Atlantic Ave., showing in the foreground the United States Apartments, built in 1882 by E. Fougera Sr.,
on the site of a drug store he had opened in 1862.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
703674f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Atlantic Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703675f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Atlantic Avenue
703675f-a.text:
Clinton Street, at, adjoining and south of Atlantic Ave., showig the corner building which was the home of the South Bro klyn Savings Bank until 1922. The bank was incorporated in 1850 and at that time was at 160
Atlantic Ave.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
703675f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Atlantic Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703016f-a.title: Brooklyn: Atlantic Avenue - Clinton Street
703016f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Clinton Street, Brooklyn, NY

703017f-a.title: Brooklyn: Atlantic Avenue - Clinton Street
703017f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Clinton Street, Brooklyn, NY

703670f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Atlantic Avenue
703670f-a.text:
Clinton Street, east side, from and including Atlantic Ave., to and including State Street. This is a view of the N.E. corner of Atlantic Ave., and Clinton Street, showing the old Brooklyn Athenaeum, famous in the 7O's and 80's as an auditorium. Later used as a Court Room.
June 11, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
703670f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Atlantic Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703671f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Atlantic Avenue
703671f-a.text:
173-177 Clinton Street, at the N.E. corner of Atlantic Ave. No. 177 at the corner, was occupied prior to 1932, as the Court of Special Sessions. Also seen is Atlantic Ave., north side, east from Clinton Street.
April 29, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
703671f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Atlantic Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703673f-b.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Atlantic Avenue
703673f-b.text:
(1)
Clinton Street, north from Atlantic Ave., showing at the left, the site upon which was the U.S. Apartments. Also seen is the 12-story
Insurance Building in the background.
April 29, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing also State Street, at, adjoining and west of the N.W.
oorner of Clinton Street.
April 29, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
703673f-b.folder: Clinton Street & Atlantic Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

(1)
Clinton Street, north from Atlantic Ave., showing at the left, the site upon which was the U.S. Apartments. Also seen is the 12-story

703014f-a.title: Brooklyn: Atlantic Avenue - Clinton Street
703014f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Clinton Street, Brooklyn, NY

703666f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Atlantic Avenue
703666f-a.text:
Clinton Street, east side, north from Atlantic Ave., to Schermerhorn Street. Also shown is several Brooklyn Skyscrapers located on the
west side of Court Street.
April 29, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
703666f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Atlantic Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
